sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"暗示"之意。
means: hint ： 指通过时间接而有提示性的话语或表情来暗示某事。
imply ： 侧重指话语、行为或情景中的一种暗示，听者或读者必须加以逻辑推断才能领会。
suggest ： 指有意或无意的，直接或间接暗示，强调事物的表征等使人引起联想。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"暗示，暗指"之意。
means: hint ： 最常用用词，多指无意中的，间接的暗示。
implication ： 指对某事不公开发表自己的意见，仅用语言动作或表情表明态度，要对方进行推断。
suggestion ： 既可指比较明显的暗示，又可指客观上流露出的迹象。

sentence.Network_en: "I think I hear the telephone ringing."—"Okay, I can take a hint."
sentence.Network_cn: “我想我听到电话铃在响。”——“好的，我明白你的意思了。”

sentence.Network_en: She'd never received the merest hint of any communication from him.
sentence.Network_cn: 她从未得到他准备沟通的一丁点儿暗示。

sentence.Network_en: Diana took the hint and left them to it.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴安娜会意，任由他们自己去解决。

jx.jx_en_mean: understand and act on a hint

lj.lj_ly: she tried to put him off but he didn't take the hint.
lj.lj_ls: 她想要让他下车，但他没领会她的暗示。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'occasion, opportunity'): apparently from obsolete hent 'grasp, get hold of', from Old English hentan, of Germanic origin; related to hunt. The basic notion is ‘something that may be taken advantage of’

entry.def: A hint is a suggestion about something that is made in an indirect way.

example.ex: The Minister gave a strong hint that the government were thinking of introducing tax concessions for mothers...
example.tran: 部长明显地暗示政府正在考虑对母亲们实行税收减免。

example.ex: I'd dropped a hint about having an exhibition of his work up here...
example.tran: 我已经暗示要在这里举办一次他的作品展。

entry.def: If you hint at something, you suggest it in an indirect way.

example.ex: She suggested a trip to the shops and hinted at the possibility of a treat of some sort...
example.tran: 她建议去逛逛商店，并暗示可能要请客。

example.ex: Criticism is hinted at, but never made explicit...
example.tran: 批评总是含沙射影，但从未明说。

entry.tran: 有益的建议;不错的主意;好点子
entry.def: A hint is a helpful piece of advice, usually about how to do something.

example.ex: Here are some helpful hints to make your journey easier...
example.tran: 几条有用的建议可以让你的旅途更轻松。

example.ex: I'm hoping to get some fashion hints.
example.tran: 我希望能得到一些有关时尚的建议。

entry.def: A hint of something is a very small amount of it.

example.ex: She added only a hint of vermouth to the gin...
example.tran: 她只在杜松子酒里加了少许苦艾酒。

example.ex: I glanced at her and saw no hint of irony on her face.
example.tran: 我瞥了她一眼，没有在她的脸上看到一丝嘲弄。

sentences.sentence: "not a breath of scandal ever touched her"
"this dish could use a touch of garlic"
"he speaks French with a trace of an accent"
"he got a tip on the stock market"

means.word_mean: 1. drop a hint; intimate by a hint

auth_sentence.content: New studies of deaf signers hint at an answer.
auth_sentence.res_content: New studies of deaf signers hint at an answer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: New studies of deaf signers hint at an answer.

auth_sentence.content: There has been little hint of that with Sterling.
auth_sentence.res_content: There has been little hint of that with Sterling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There has been little hint of that with Sterling.

auth_sentence.content: This was tastefulness without a hint of bourgeois conceit.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was tastefulness without a hint of bourgeois conceit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This was tastefulness without a hint of bourgeois conceit.

Sentence.sentence: And though Hu Jintao and the rest of the Chinese leadership aren't inclined to lecture visiting Presidents, he might gently hint that Beijing is getting a little nervous about the value of the dollar-which has fallen 15% since March, in large part because of increasing fears that America's debt load is becoming unmanageable.
That's what happens when you're the world's biggest creditor: you get to drop hints like that, which would be enough by themselves to create international economic chaos if they were ever leaked.

sentences.en: He hinted his dissatisfaction with her work.
sentences.cn: 他暗示了对她工作的不满。

sentences.en: They hinted to us that they would take our suggestion.
sentences.cn: 他们向我们暗示说, 他们将采纳我们的建议。

sentences.en: He gave me a hint that I was being cheated.

means.word_mean: 细微的迹象, 少许, 微量

sentences.en: There's a subtle hint of garlic in the sauce.
sentences.cn: 调味汁里稍微有一点蒜味。

sentences.en: This list of hints help the new students a lot.
sentences.cn: 这一系列的建议对新生帮助很大。

jushi.english: He hinted his dissatisfaction with her work.
jushi.chinese: 他暗示了对她工作的不满。

jushi.english: He hinted nothing of his intentions.
I hinted that she should go.
